attributes.action: Make Weather forecasters accountable for incorrect forecasting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These days, the weather on TV or indeed radio is a programme in itself.  Forecasters are so smug and sanctimonious, whenever they broadcast.  Sadly, they frequently get the weather totaly incorrect...then they laugh it off next time with a "Oh - didn't we get it wrong folks?  Some people alter their plans, simply on the strength of a forecast...why shouldn't they be accountable?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
